title: Top Engineering Colleges in Andhra Pradesh 2024: Ranking, Fees, Placement
meta_description: Are you looking for a reliable and trustworthy source for all colleges? Collegedunia lists the best Engineering Colleges in Andhra Pradesh 2024 based on various parameters.
keywords: Best Engineering Colleges in Andhra Pradesh, Top Engineering Colleges in Andhra Pradesh, Top 10 Engineering Colleges in Andhra Pradesh, Top BTech Colleges in Andhra Pradesh, Engineering Colleges in Vijaywada

faqs.question: How many Engineering colleges are there in Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.Andhra Pradesh has many engineering colleges providing quality education to engineering students in the state. KL University, AUCE, GGU, and SVUCE are some of the top colleges. The state has a total of 360 engineering colleges, with 294 being private and 56 government.

faqs.question: What are the Top 10 Engineering Colleges in Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.The top 10 engineering colleges in Andhra Pradesh based on their rankings are as follows.College NameNIRF Ranking 2023India Today Ranking 2023Times Ranking 2023K L College of Engineering44943IIT Tirupati59Not RankedNot RankedVignan's Foundation for Science, Technology and Research8513332AU College of Engineering (A)9463Not RankedGandhi Institute of Technology and Management101 - 150Not RankedNot RankedJawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada101 - 150Not RankedNot RankedJawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Ananthapuramu151 - 200Not RankedNot RankedSree Vidyanikethan Engineering College151 - 200Not RankedNot RankedGMR Institute of Technology-107Not RankedSri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology-88Not Ranked

faqs.question: What are the Top Government Engineering Colleges in Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.Andhra Pradesh is home to some of the best government engineering colleges in the region. AUCE, JNTU, IIT Tirupati and IIIT Sri City are some of the best government engineering colleges. The top colleges are as follows.College NameTotal Fees (INR)Andhra University, College of Engineering (AUCE), Vishakhapatnam8 LakhsJNTU, Anantapur1 LakhsIIT Tirupati9.16 LakhsIIIT Sri City12.84 Lakhs

faqs.question: What are the Top Private Engineering Colleges in Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.KL University, GGU, Vignan's Foundation for Science, Technology and Research, Guntur and JNTUK University College of Engineering are some of the best private engineering colleges in Andhra Pradesh. It has a total of 294 private engineering colleges. The top private engineering colleges are mentioned in the table below.College NameTotal Fees (INR)KL University, Guntur10.2 LakhsGodavari Global University (GGU), East Godavari2.34 LakhsVignan's Foundation for Science, Technology and Research, Guntur4.8 LakhsJNTUK University College of Engineering, East Godavari40,000

faqs.question: Which college is best for placements in Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.Engineering colleges in Andhra Pradesh provide students with overall good placement packages. The colleges attract top recruiters during their placement drive. KL College of Engineering and NIT AP are the best engineering colleges for placements in Andhra Pradesh with average packages of INR 12.2 LPA and INR 6.89 LPA.JNTU Anantapur, AU College of Engineering, GMR Institute of Technology and G.Pulla Reddy Engineering College are other engineering colleges known for their placements in Andhra Pradesh.

faqs.question: What is the fee structure for Top Engineering Colleges in Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.The fee structure for top engineering colleges in Andhra Pradesh is mentioned in the table below.Fee Range (INR)College Name25,000Invotech Precision Engineers, CAE Guntur25,000 - 50,000AUCE, SVUCE50,000 - 75,000AUCE, JNTUK Kakinada75,000 - 1,00,000SVUCE, SVCET1,00,000 - 2,00,000AUCE, SVUCE2,00,000+KL University, AUCE

faqs.question: Which are the most popular entrance exams accepted by Top Engineering Colleges in Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.AP EAPCET, AP PGECET and AP POLYCET are the top state entrance exams accepted by engineering colleges in Andhra Pradesh. At the national level, Andhra Pradesh engineering colleges accept exams like GATE, JEE Main and more. The entrance exam details are as follows.Exam NameNumber of CollegesAP EAPCET272AP PGECET185AP POLYCET127GATE107JEE Main22

faqs.question: What are the AP EAPCET accepting Engineering colleges in Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Most engineering colleges in Andhra Pradesh provide admission based on candidates' performance in the AP EAPCET exam. The top colleges that accept AP EAPCET in Andhra Pradesh are as follows.AUCE.SVUCE.GGU.Vignan's Foundation for Science, Technology and Research.JNTUK Kakinada.

faqs.question: What are the Top Engineering Colleges in Andhra Pradesh for CSE?
faqs.answer: CSE is a popular engineering discipline in engineering colleges in Andhra Pradesh. CSE courses are offered by many colleges at different levels. Some of the top colleges are as follows.KL University.IIT Tirupati.AUCE.Vignan's Foundation for Science, Technology and Research.SVUCE.

faqs.question: What are the Top Engineering Colleges in Andhra Pradesh for Lateral Entry?
faqs.answer: Ans.Many engineering colleges in Andhra Pradesh offer lateral entry to students looking to change colleges. Most colleges provide admission based on the AP ECET exam. The top colleges to provide lateral entry in Andhra Pradesh are as follows.GMRIT.Rajeev Gandhi Memorial College of Engineering & Technology.Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering.Anil Neerukonda Institute of Technology and Sciences.Aditya Institute of Technology and Management.

faqs.question: What are the good engineering colleges in Andhra Pradesh which offer direct admission?
faqs.answer: Ans.Andhra Pradesh has many engineering colleges that offer admission based on merit. It is beneficial for students who do not wish to appear in the entrance exam. Some of the top colleges are listed below.GITAM University.AU College of Engineering for Women.Chaitanya Engineeringg College.Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology.GMR Institute of Technology.
